comments.content: Yummmm... I have tried a different version (recipe) of the strawberry shortcake. But your recipe looks better. Want to try this weekend. Thanks for sharing.

comments.author: Russell at Chasing Delicious
comments.content: Such an interesting recipe. I love the idea of a corn bread cake. The tarragon whipped cream sounds intriguing. I don't have any tarragon though, but tons of basil. Do you think that would work too? Or do I need to go find myself some tarragon?

comments.content:
I think basil would be nice here as well; it seems to me that it would properly complement the berries. If you try it, let me know what you think!
